/rsc/js/tiny_mce/plugins/spellchecker/includes/ -> PSpellEngine.php (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  <?php
   2  /**
   3   * PSpellEngine.php
   4   *
   5   * Copyright, Moxiecode Systems AB
   6   * Released under LGPL License.
   7   *
   8   * License: http://www.tinymce.com/license
   9   * Contributing: http://www.tinymce.com/contributing
  10   */
  11  
  12  class TinyMCE_SpellChecker_PSpellEngine extends TinyMCE_SpellChecker_Engine {
  13      /**
  14       * Spellchecks an array of words.
  15       *
  16       * @param String $lang Selected language code (like en_US or de_DE). Shortcodes like "en" and "de" work with enchant >= 1.4.1
  17       * @param Array $words Array of words to check.
  18       * @return Name/value object with arrays of suggestions.
  19       */
  20  	public function getSuggestions($lang, $words) {
  21          $config = $this->getConfig();
  22  
  23          switch ($config['PSpell.mode']) {
  24              case "fast":
  25                  $mode = PSPELL_FAST;
  26                  break;
  27  
  28              case "slow":
  29                  $mode = PSPELL_SLOW;
  30                  break;
  31  
  32              default:
  33                  $mode = PSPELL_NORMAL;
  34          }
  35  
  36          // Setup PSpell link
  37          $plink = pspell_new(
  38              $lang,
  39              $config['pspell.spelling'],
  40              $config['pspell.jargon'],
  41              $config['pspell.encoding'],
  42              $mode
  43          );
  44  
  45          if (!$plink) {
  46              throw new Exception("No PSpell link found opened.");
  47          }
  48  
  49          $outWords = array();
  50          foreach ($words as $word) {
  51              if (!pspell_check($plink, trim($word))) {
  52                  $outWords[] = utf8_encode($word);
  53              }
  54          }
  55  
  56          return $outWords;
  57      }
  58  
  59      /**
  60       * Return true/false if the engine is supported by the server.
  61       *
  62       * @return boolean True/false if the engine is supported.
  63       */
  64  	public function isSupported() {
  65          return function_exists("pspell_new");
  66      }
  67  }
  68  
  69  TinyMCE_Spellchecker_Engine::add("pspell", "TinyMCE_SpellChecker_PSpellEngine");
  70  ?>
